comment: /**  * Determine if any agent reloader is active.  * @return true if agent reloading is active  */
code: /**  * Determine if any agent reloader is active.  * @return true if agent reloading is active  */ public static boolean isActive() {     return isActive(null) || isActive(AgentReloader.class.getClassLoader()) || isActive(ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader()). }

private static boolean isActive(ClassLoader classLoader) {     for (String agentClass : AGENT_CLASSES) {         if (ClassUtils.isPresent(agentClass, classLoader)) {             return true.         }     }     return false. }
